scenario.name: alice_registers
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "alice" <sip:alice@[remote_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: "alice" <sip:alice@[remote_ip]:[local_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: sip:alice@[local_ip]:[local_port] Content-Length: 0 Expires: 300
